content:
I am getting this error

Device/phg-ecde3d4e58532d31.000000000000: Device    error   Profile http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/phd/StructureDefinition/PhgDevice, Element 'Device.property[singleCodedProperties]': minimum required = 1, but only found 0

Unless NONE of my slicing is working on the Device.property this error is hard to solve. The example PHD and PHF resources all have this property (turns out to be the time synchronization). How can I get more information?

@Lloyd McKenzie could this error message be due to the fact that the validator is reporting that the code system is unsupported?
